articles.title: Perception of Mayfield shifting amid MVP-type run
articles.summary: Baker Mayfield has seen the perception himself change dramatically from the time he was a first overall draft pick with the Browns to being what some have described as an MVP candidate in his third year with the Buccaneers.

articles.title: Bengals to start Flacco at QB against Packers
articles.summary: The Bengals will start newly acquired quarterback Joe Flacco this Sunday against the Packers, coach Zac Taylor announced Wednesday.

articles.title: Browns coach not yet ready to tab Sanders QB2
articles.summary: Browns coach Kevin Stefanski on Wednesday was noncommittal about whether rookie Shedeur Sanders -- or practice squad quarterback Bailey Zappe -- would be the team's backup quarterback in the aftermath of trading Joe Flacco to the Bengals.

articles.title: Lions' Arnold relieved injury won't end his season
articles.summary: Lions starting cornerback Terrion Arnold said Wednesday he's "trying to come back as fast as possible" said he was relieved that his shoulder injury doesn't appear to be season-ending.

articles.title: Cards watch Murray foot injury as QB day-to-day
articles.summary: Cardinals quarterback Kyler Murray (foot) will not practice Wednesday and is considered day-to-day for the rest of the week, coach Jonathan Gannon said.

articles.title: Giants WR Slayton ruled out for game vs. Eagles
articles.summary: Giants wide receiver Darius Slayton (hamstring) has been ruled out for Thursday night's game against the Eagles.

articles.title: Eagles stars downplay meeting amid recent woes
articles.summary: Eagles stars Saquon Barkley and Jalen Hurts confirmed that they spoke with A.J. Brown earlier this week but dismissed the idea that the meeting was contentious.

articles.title: Dickerson (ankle) out for Eagles' injured O-line
articles.summary: Adding to the injury woes of the Eagles' offensive line, left guard Landon Dickerson has been ruled out of Thursday night's game at the Giants with a left ankle injury sustained in Sunday's loss to the Broncos.
